'''1.20.2 Release Candidate 1''' (known as '''1.20.2-rc1''' in the launcher) is the first release candidate for [[Java Edition 1.20.2]], released on September 15, 2023,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-20-2-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.20.2 Release Candidate 1|September 15, 2023}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''General'''
* The positions that all entities ride on minecarts have been adjusted to make more sense.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.20.2 Release Candidate 1
|;dev
|265238|{{cd|trade_rebalance}} loot tables have a wrong type.
|;previous
|265388|Mobs now sit too high in minecarts.
}}</onlyinclude>
